handler.description: Used to set/unset arbitrary feature flags.

FeatureFlag.description: Gives full control over Console feature flags.

EncodedCodeRef.description:
Code reference, encoded as an object literal.

The value of the `$codeRef` property should be formatted as `moduleName.exportName` (referring to a named export) or `moduleName` (referring to the `default` export).

ExtensionFlags.description: Console feature flags used to gate extension instances.

flag.description: The name of the flag to set once the CRD is detected.

model.description: The model which refers to a `CustomResourceDefinition`.

ModelFeatureFlag.description: Adds new Console feature flag driven by the presence of a CRD on the cluster.

handler.description: Used to set/unset arbitrary feature flags.

FeatureFlagHookProvider.description: Gives full control over Console feature flags with hook handlers.

scope.description: The key to represent the reducer-managed substate within the Redux state object.

reducer.description: The reducer function, operating on the reducer-managed substate.

ReduxReducer.description: Adds new reducer to Console Redux store which operates on `plugins.<scope>` substate.

ContextProvider.description: Adds new React context provider to Console application root.

component.description: The component to be rendered when the route matches.

path.description: Valid URL path or array of paths that `path-to-regexp@^1.7.0` understands.

exact.description: When true, will only match if the path matches the `location.pathname` exactly.

StandaloneRoutePage.description:
Adds new standalone page (rendered outside the common page layout) to Console router.

Under the hood we use React Router. See https://v5.reactrouter.com/

label.description: Label for the create prop action.

path.description: Path for the create prop action.

priority.description: Priority for the status component. Bigger value means higher priority.

predicate.description: Predicate that tells whether to render the status component or not.
Predicate that tells whether to use the extension or not.

onPVCKill.description: Method for the PVC delete operation.

alert.description: Alert component to show additional information.

name.description: The name of the cluster config resource instance.

namespace.description: The namespace of the cluster config resource instance.

prefixNamespaced.description: if true, adds /k8s/ns/active-namespace to the begining

id.description: A unique identifier for this item.

perspective.description: The perspective ID to which this item belongs to. If not specified, contributes to the default perspective.

section.description: Navigation section to which this item belongs to. If not specified, render this item as a top level link.

dataAttributes.description: Adds data attributes to the DOM.

startsWith.description: Mark this item as active when the URL starts with one of these paths.

insertBefore.description: Insert this item before the item referenced here. For arrays, the first one found in order is used.

insertAfter.description: Insert this item after the item referenced here. For arrays, the first one found in order is used. `insertBefore` takes precedence.

model.description: The model to customize. May specify only a group, or optional version and kind.

badge.description: Whether to consider this model reference as tech preview or dev preview.

color.description: The color to associate to this model.

label.description: Override the label. Requires `kind` be provided.

labelPlural.description: Override the plural label. Requires `kind` be provided.

abbr.description: Customize the abbreviation. Defaults to All uppercase chars in the kind up to 4 characters long. Requires `kind` be provided.

catalogDescription.description: Description for the type specific catalog.

filters.description: Custom filters specific to the catalog item.

groupings.description: Custom groupings specific to the catalog item.

groupings.description: Custom groupings specific to the catalog item.

type.description: Type ID for the catalog item type.

title.description: Title for the catalog item provider

priority.description: Priority for this provider. Defaults to 0. Higher priority providers may override catalog items provided by other providers.

type.description: Type ID for the catalog item type.

type.description: Type ID for the catalog item type.

provider.description: A hook which returns a function that will be used to provide metadata to catalog items of a specific type.

contextId.description: The context ID helps to narrow the scope of contributed actions to a particular area of the application. Ex - topology, helm

provider.description: A react hook which returns actions for the given scope. If contextId = `resource` then the scope will always be a K8s resource object

ActionProvider.description: ActionProvider contributes a hook that returns list of actions for specific context

model.description: The model for which this provider provides actions for.

provider.description: A react hook which returns actions for the given resource model

ResourceActionProvider.description: ResourceActionProvider contributes a hook that returns list of actions for specific resource model

label.description: The label to display in the UI. Required for submenus.

submenu.description: Whether this group should be displayed as submenu

insertAfter.description: Insert this item after the item referenced here. For arrays, the first one found in order is used. insertBefore takes precedence.

ActionGroup.description: ActionGroup contributes an action group that can also be a submenu

contextId.description: The context ID helps to narrow the scope of contributed actions to a particular area of the application. Ex - topology, helm

filter.description: A function which will filter actions based on some conditions. scope: The scope in which actions should be provided for. Note: hook may be required if we want to remove the ModifyCount action from a deployment with HPA

ActionFilter.description: ActionFilter can be used to filter an action

DetailsTab.description: DetailsTab contributes a tab for the topology details panel.

tab.description: The parent tab ID that this section should contribute to.

provider.description: A hook that returns a component or null/undefined that will be rendered in the topology sidebar. SDK component: <Section title={<optional>}>... padded area </Section>

priority.description: A higher priority factory will get the first chance to create the link.

link.description: Return the resource link if provided, otherwise undefined. Use ResourceIcon and ResourceLink for styles.

contentProvider.description: Hook to return the contents of the Alert.

CustomExtension.description:
Custom Console extension with arbitrary `type` and `properties`.

This is a special type representing all non-standard Console extension declarations.

This allows dynamic plugins to consume extensions which are specific to other plugins.
